sentences.sContent: He decided to devote the rest of his life to scientific investigation.
sentences.sCn: 他决定把余生奉献给科学研究。

remMethod.val: de(表加强) + vote(投票) → 把票全给了某个人 → 献身于

words.tran: 虔诚的，祷告的；信仰的；献身的
献身于…；致力于…（devote的过去分词）

trans.tranOther: to use a particular area, period of time, or amount of space for a specific purpose
